Function Documentation

object* arm_create_object (  const char *  makefile_path,
const char *  object_file
) 
 

creates an object from the .o file

Parameters:
makefile_path the path to the makefile excluding last slash. relative to TriX program file.
object_file the name of the object created by the makefile
Returns:
NULL on failure or pointer to object. You have to free it with util_free_object!

object* arm_create_object_from_makefile (  const char *  makefile_path,
const char *  object_file
) 
 

invokes make and creates an object from the .o file

Parameters:
makefile_path the path to the makefile excluding last slash. relative to TriX program file.
object_file the name of the object created by the makefile
Returns:
NULL on failure or pointer to object. You have to free it with util_free_object!

int arm_run_makefile (  const char *  makefile_path  ) 
 

invokes make and creates objects from the .o file

Parameters:
makefile_path the path to the makefile excluding last slash. relative to TriX program file.
Returns:
E_FAIL on failure or E_OK if everything was okay
